Already have an account? Sign In here

Terms and Conditions
\ Welcome to CaQu! 
\ By using our application, you agree to the following Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with these terms, please stop using the service. 
\ 1. Introduction\ 1.1. CaQu is a health application aimed at bridging health gaps for vulnerable communities by providing accessible health information, personalized health monitoring, and connections to local health services. 1.2. This application does not replace professional medical advice or diagnosis. For medical needs, please consult a healthcare professional. 
\
2. App Usage\ 2.1. CaQu is intended for individuals aged 18 and above, or minors with parental/guardian consent. 2.2. You are prohibited from using the app for unlawful purposes, defamation, or violating the rights of others. 2.3. All data and information you input into the app are your sole responsibility.
\
3. User Account\ 3.1. You must create an account to access certain features of CaQu. 3.2. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials. We are not liable for unauthorized use of your account. 3.3. If you suspect unauthorized activity on your account, report it to us immediately.
\
4. Use of Personal Data\ 4.1. We collect and process your personal data in accordance with our Privacy Policy. 4.2. Your data is used to enhance your experience, including health recommendations, reminders, and personal health analysis.
\
5. Limitation of Liability\ 5.1. CaQu provides services on an "as is" basis without warranties of any kind. 5.2. We are not liable for any direct, indirect, or consequential damages resulting from the use of this app. 5.3. Information provided by chatbots or recommendation features does not replace consultations with healthcare professionals.
\
6. Service Modifications\ 6.1. We reserve the right to modify, add, or remove features in the app at any time without prior notice. 6.2. Changes to these Terms and Conditions will be communicated through the app or via email.
\
7. Intellectual Property Rights\ 7.1. All copyrights, trademarks, and intellectual property rights related to this application are owned by CaQu. 7.2. Duplication, modification, or distribution of app content without our written permission is prohibited.
\
8. Governing Law\ These Terms and Conditions are governed and interpreted under the laws of [your country]. Any disputes will be resolved through mediation or courts with jurisdiction.
